column4: hey can someone help me install a file that needs root privelages?
ok
but see i dunno how to enable it
like i need to drag a file to the /usr/lib file so yami pod will work. but when i try to drag it, it says i need administrator privelages
it says i need root provelages
so
so what do i need to type in the terminal to get root provelages
open a terminal  sudo cp /source /destination
command for copying
where is the file you need to move ?
then sudo cp  /media/yamipod/filename /usr/lib/filename
linux is case sensitive ,  meaning capital letters count
read this  http://www.linuxcommand.org/index.php that will get you started in command line stuff
alt_f2   type  gksu nautilus
if it shows up on your desktop that is whre it is mounted
sudo apt-get isntall df ?
what is df %?
to run a command as root you type the command with sudo before it
to run a program as root you put sudo before the name ofthe command to start the program   as in sudo command
you've been told at least 5 times just by me
sudo adept
frostwrie is not in adept , you dl it form the frostwire site, and you double click the pacakge , it will ask foryour password and it will intsall
